title: House in Maharagama 01
details:
The most luxurious and appreciated property which you can obtain from the heart of the Maharagama, city which is well developed with facilities including leading supermarkets, fashion outlets, banks, international schools and many more.
Prime Villas Maharagama offers 7 modern architecturally designed villas with modern luxuries and harmonizing with the nature. We have designed these villas to offer the utmost comfortable and convenience to your life.
These villas are built on 7 to 10 perch blocks by efficiently using the space to give you the maximum output. Following features are included;
